title: CSI 4 Hard Evidence(Will1529)PAL+Covers
description:
===================================================================================
This is an ISO File so Just right click file select /open with/ and use one of the following programs to burn on to DVD at 4x speed.............Enjoy
===================================================================================
Programs

Nero 
Power ISO
Magic ISO




Special Features
 
5 Twisted and Bizarre cases to solve:
A casino high roller&#039;s wife almost dies - was it suicide, or a murder attempt?
A cabbie is burned to death in his car.
The death of an eye doctor&#039;s blind wife, stabbed through the eyes.
An entire rock band is electrocuted on stage, but was it an accident?
A murder turns up where there is 3 possible suspects, all identical triplets. Who did it?


Features:

New CSI garage laboratory for disassembling and analyzing large objects like cars, visual update of the screens to reflect CSI authenticity, and CSI mid-case &#039;quizzes&#039; that challenge you to prove you understand the evidence.
More realistic real-time 3D characters and locations. Better visual effects when using tools in the field.
Twice the animation and special actions of characters from CSI 3 (videos and cinematics).
More interactive gameplay using the lab equipment.
More interactive areas to search - more ways to discover hidden evidence on tools.
Better in-game CSI hint system.
Streamlined user interface.


Review
 
Find and interpret the evidence. Solve the crime. Take a journey inside the criminal mind and find out if you have what it takes to be a member of the Las Vegas Police Department&#039;s elite Crime Scene Investigation unit. Work alongside CSI agents Gil Grissom, Catherine Willows, Warrick Brown, Sara Sidle, Nick Stokes, Coroner Al Robbins and Detective Jim Brass in 5 distinctive cases. Solve baffling crimes. Collect and analyse evidence using real-world forensic equipment and cutting edge investigative techniques. Evidence is hard to find, suspects lie unless proof is found.
